lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: Oh, Sosuke! You look serious. What’s on your mind?

lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: I have some [type:noun, eng:questions, jpn:質問] for you.

lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: I was in the [type:noun, eng:yard, jpn:庭] [type:phrase, eng:watering flowers, jpn:花に水をやっていた].

lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: I was [type:phrase, eng:watering flowers, jpn:花に水をやっていた].

lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: I was [type:phrase, eng:watering flowers, jpn:花に水をやっていた].

lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: I also needed them for the potion.

lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: I was in the [type:noun, eng:bathroom, jpn:お風呂場].

lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: Well… I started in the [type:noun, eng:kitchen, jpn:台所] to get some [type:noun, eng:ingredients, jpn:材料].

lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: Then I went to my [type:noun, eng:room, jpn:部屋] to mix a special [type:noun, eng:potion, jpn:薬].

lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: Then I went to the [type:noun, eng:bathroom, jpn:お風呂場].

lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: I was just [type:phrase, eng:cleaning the bathroom, jpn:お風呂場を掃除していた].

lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: I was making a [type:phrase, eng:magic toilet cleaner, jpn:魔法のトイレ洗剤].

lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: Haru helped me, and he got [type:noun, eng:cake, jpn:ケーキ] on his nose and fingers!

lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: Finally, I poured it in the [type:noun, eng:bathroom, jpn:お風呂場]. That’s why it smells so [type:adjective, eng:sweet, jpn:甘い]!

lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: Don’t worry, it’s safe! Very clean now.

lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: I was right here, in the [type:noun, eng:living room, jpn:居間].

lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: I was [type:phrase, eng:playing with Haru, jpn:ハルと遊んで] and [type:phrase, eng:drinking tea, jpn:お茶を飲んでいた].

actions.value: Playing with Haru and drinking tea

lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: I was [type:phrase, eng:playing with Haru and drinking tea, jpn:ハルと遊んでお茶を飲んでいた].

actions.value: Playing with Haru and drinking tea

lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: I'm [type:adjective, eng:sorry, jpn:ごめん] about your cake dear.

lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: There should be more in the [type:noun, eng:fridge, jpn:冷蔵庫].

lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: It’s all gone!

lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: Oh no… I don’t know what happened to the last two slices.

lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: I only took one slice for my [type:phrase, eng:magic toilet cleaner, jpn:魔法のトイレ洗剤].

lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: There were still [type:noun, eng:two slices, jpn:二切れ] left when I was done!

lines.speaker: Kiyomi
lines.text: Alright… I’m a [type:noun, eng:witch, jpn:魔女], Sosuke.
